title: Who is better, Travis Scott or Kanye West? - Quora

response.answer_text: Wow, this may just be the most obvious question I've ever read. Well, let's list the achievements of each rapper. Kanye's achievements: -Signed several successful rappers (Big Sean, for example) who are making it big now. -Is widely considered to be one of the best rappers of all time. -Has collaborated with countless other artists. -His album My Dark Twisted Fantasy is considered to be one of the greatest albums of all time. -Has inspired probably hundreds of rappers. -Has still maintained his fanbase. Travis Scott's achievements: -Made a hit song that only went famous thanks to Drake -Songs are so constantly overplayed that it genuinely bothers me, because I can't go into a parking lot without someone blasting Sicko Mode or Stop Trying To Be God. So yeah, I think the answer is obvious.

Whoever thinks Kanye is better is a Maga hat wearing jackass that gobbles up bullshit faster than it can be fed to them. He, like his wife, is a self promoting narcissist that only cares about himself. I wish he would lose his voice forever and we would never have to hear him rudely take over a stage ever again. He is trash.
